org.akubraproject.txn
Class AbstractTransactionalConnection.TxnBlob

java.lang.Object
  org.akubraproject.impl.AbstractBlob
      org.akubraproject.txn.AbstractTransactionalConnection.TxnBlob
All Implemented Interfaces:
Blob
Enclosing class:
AbstractTransactionalConnection
protected class AbstractTransactionalConnection.TxnBlob
extends AbstractBlob

A transactional blob implementation. This blob caches underlying infos such as the store-id and the store-blob, and hence only works properly in conjunction with the blob-cache which guarantees only one instance of this class per blob-id at any given time.

Method Detail

getCanonicalId

public URI getCanonicalId()
Description copied from interface: Blob
Gets the canonical id of the blob, if known. The definition of what is canonical is up to the individual store implementation. When available, the canonical id should be used in caches and other indexes where duplication is undesirable.

Specified by:
getCanonicalId in interface Blob
Overrides:
getCanonicalId in class AbstractBlob
Returns:
the canonical id, if known; null otherwise.

public boolean exists()

Description copied from interface: Blob
Tests if a blob with this id exists in this blob-store.

Returns:
true if the blob denoted by this id exists; false otherwise.
Throws:
IOException - if an error occurred during existence check

delete

public void delete()
            throws IOException
Description copied from interface: Blob
Removes this blob from the store. This operation is idempotent and does not throw an exception if the blob does not exist.

Throws:
IOException - if the blob cannot be deleted for any reason

moveTo

public Blob moveTo(URI blobId,
                   Map<String,String> hints)
            throws IOException
Description copied from interface: Blob
Move this blob under the new id. Before the move, this blob must exist and the destination blob must not. After the move, this blob will not exist but the destination blob will.

Parameters:
blobId - the blob id; may be null if the store supports id-generation
hints - A set of hints to allow the implementation to optimize the operation (can be null)
Returns:
the resulting Blob from the move
Throws:
UnsupportedIdException - if blobId is not in a recognized/usable pattern by this store
MissingBlobException - if this blob does not exist
DuplicateBlobException - if a blob with blobId already exists
IOException - if an error occurs while attempting the operation

the size in bytes, or -1 if unknown

public InputStream openInputStream()
                            throws IOException

the input stream.

openOutputStream

public OutputStream openOutputStream(long estimatedSize,
                                     boolean overwrite)
                              throws IOException,
                                     DuplicateBlobException
Description copied from interface: Blob
Opens a new OutputStream for writing the content. If the blob does not exist it is created with the data written to the stream as the content; else if overwrite is true the existing content is replaced with the new data.

Parameters:
estimatedSize - the estimated size of the data if known (or -1 if unknown). This can allow for the implementation to make better decisions on buffering or reserving space.
overwrite - if false and this blob already exists then do not overwrite the contents but throw an exception instead
Returns:
the output stream.
Throws:
DuplicateBlobException - if this blob exists and overwrite is false
IOException - if the stream cannot be opened for any other reason.
